mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Built for Major James H. Dooley and his wife Sallie May. It was converted to a private club and then between 1949-1998 it was used by the University of Science and Philosophy, founded by Walter Russel. Based partially on the Villa Medici, Rome. Now (2023) open for tours and as a private event space. [work]
